parsed.title: O Bispo que Criou o Ódio que Ainda Mata
parsed.summary: Um simples selo assinado por um bispo no século XV desencadeou um mito de sangue que alimentou a perseguição aos judeus por séculos. O mesmo documento foi usado como moeda de poder, financiando catedrais e enriquecendo a hierarquia e, mais de 500 anos depois, inspirou um jovem a justificar um ataque mortal a uma sinagoga. Quando o dinheiro do confisco pagou a arma que ceifou uma vida, o eco da injustiça medieval se fez presente no presente, revelando como o mecanismo de poder persiste e se renov... [truncated 2 chars]

scenes.narration: Um bispo assinou. 500 anos depois, o mesmo mito ressurgiu.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, close-up of a medieval bishop's seal pressed into parchment, low angle, candlelight flickering on the wax seal, dust particles swirling in the beam, the same seal reflected on a modern computer monitor displaying the digitized image, shadows dancing across the desk, bishop_study
scenes.motionDescription: camera slowly dolly in on the seal, then a subtle pan to the monitor screen as the digital image appears
scenes.audioDescription: soft rustle of parchment, distant echo of a quill scratching, faint hum of a computer fan

scenes.narration: Ele confiscou bens judaicos, encher a catedral; séculos depois, um atirador usou o mito.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, ledger open on a wooden table showing rows of confiscated assets, illuminated by a single candle, beside it a modern laptop screen displaying a manifesto excerpt referencing the medieval case, light filtering through a cracked window, bishop_study
scenes.motionDescription: slow zoom on the ledger entries, then a quick tilt to the laptop screen as the manifesto scrolls
scenes.audioDescription: paper pages turning, low electronic beep, murmured typing in the background

scenes.narration: O dinheiro do confisco pagou a arma que matou uma mulher na sinagoga.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, newspaper front page on a desk, headline about a synagogue shooting, photo of a grieving woman in black, soft rain streaking the window, monitor displaying the article, monitor_room
scenes.motionDescription: camera pans from the headline to the woman's face, then a subtle focus pull on the article text
scenes.audioDescription: distant siren wail, hushed crowd murmurs, rain tapping against glass

scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, empty dimly lit study with a single candle burning low, shadows stretched across the floor, silence envelops the space, bishop_study
scenes.motionDescription: static shot, lingering on the empty chair as the candle flickers and fades

backgroundMusic.prompt: Dark Ambient, Low Drone, Subtle Strings, Tension, Cinematic, Mysterious, 80 BPM
